comment._content: Charles Franklin Thwing (1853-1937), American clergyman and college president, active early supporter of the NAACP: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Franklin_Thwing Several books written by Thwing are available as Googlebooks.

comment._content: pennylrichardsca:  Thank you for the information on Charles Franklin Thwing.  We will add some of it to the description when we update.
